summary: A young golfer is mugged by an escaped convict and finds himself in a prison where he foils a jailbreak.
cast: Buster Keaton|Sybil Seely|Joe Roberts|Edward F. Cline|Joe Keaton|Louise Keaton|Harry Keaton
director: Directors: Edward F. Cline (as Eddie Cline), Buster Keaton (as 'Buster' Keaton)
title: Convicto 13
